plots.content:
Tribute to @maxwellinked's work and notably the "Waiting Room": https://objkt.com/asset/hicetnunc/606990.

Please check @maxwellinked's work, Tim Maxwell is an awesome artist that is drawing by hand with a pen a lot of consecutive lines. I have tried to reproduce some of his style with automation and with a plotting machine for the Genuary entry "Trade styles with a friend." (JAN.6)

A4 watercolor paper, fountain pen with Black ink.

Other try:

Recursively slicing polygons.

Entry for https://genuary.art/ Jan.5 "Destroy a square."

A4 watercolor paper, fountain pen with Black ink.

data.title: Shattered square
data.description: Recursively slicing polygons. Entry for https://genuary.art/ Jan.5 Destroy a square.

Entry for https://genuary.art/ Jan.1 "Draw 10,000 of something."

Packing circles with various filling techniques (same primitives as in "Plottable Mountain Moons"). A3 watercolor paper, fountain pen and Diamine Teal ink.
